website_summaries.verdict: Allows you to make a pair of restaurant-quality omelets in a little more than 5 minutes.
pros: Setting it up is as easy as plugging it in
We love how evenly it cooks the eggs
A worthwhile product for people who appreciate kitchen gadgets
cons: No indicator lights so you’ll want to time how long you’re cooking

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT OMELETTE MAKER
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous in purchasing this omelette maker because it was so inexpensive but boy, I really love it!! I have told many people about it. Very easy to use and quick. I wish they would have put better instructions in the box but I figured out by trial and error how long each omelette takes to cook. I just quickly chop up some green pepper, mushrooms, tomatoes, onions, throw in cheese and mix them with 3 eggs. That is perfect for making 2 nice size omelettes. Even though it states you don't have to use PAM each time, I do and just spray a little on each side. I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased 😁 so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good used it today my omelette was good my granddaughter ate the most of it she said nana this good 😂.Pretty good size omelette also just spray before each use and use a plastic spatula no metal .Also is very easy to clean .So far for keeps if anything changes I will let you all know
customer_reviews.author: Tasha26

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be a scared of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Don’t be a scared of the reviews. I was a little nervous about how this omelette maker would work based on the reviews. But for less than six dollars, I figured it was worth a shot. I just made my first omelettes and they turned out great! I used egg beaters and used the measurements on the carton to put a little less than two eggs in each compartment. I also added in some milk, cheese, and mushrooms. I closed the lid and about seven minutes later I had perfectly cooked omelettes. Pretty good for a first try!
customer_reviews.author: Aratay

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. I do wish there was a signal ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I do wish there was a signal that said when the omelet was done. Sometimes I have to do some guessing, but otherwise I really like this
customer_reviews.author: Tony C

customer_reviews.title: It is smaller than expected, the plates can not ...
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than expected, the plates can not be removed to clean and I don't think it cooks very evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: So Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not knowing how much of a difference it would make realistically. I was disappointed that it wasn't a set it and forget it kind of appliance. HOWEVER...the omelets that come out of here are so delicious and perfect. You get to know how long it needs to be in there for your desired doneness. I use it to meal prep and make 2 at a time. Can make enough for a whole week in less than 30 min and it's perfection every time. This takes the burning and careless flipping out of omelet making. No more disheveled omelets.
customer_reviews.author: PJBenson

customer_reviews.title: I’m very pleased
customer_reviews.text: For $23 I was expecting to receive crap but I’m very pleased with this little omelette maker. It makes perfect omelettes, I’m speechless.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, great gift.
customer_reviews.text: For Christmas breakfast this year I decided to make omelets. Started panicking just before Christmas about making 7 - we wouldn't be able to eat together. Found this on Amazon, great price, makes 2. I have 2 sons, so I bought 3, had them set up on the counter like an assembly line, we were all eating at close to the same time. Easy cleanup, they each got one for a Christmas gift, and I've kept one. Great for just me and my hubbie also. Good size omelet. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: PRODG

customer_reviews.title: Stops working after 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this back in December it worked great at first pretty fast to cook the omelette. We used it about every Sunday up until the beginning of April when we went to plug it in and it wouldn't turn on. Its a reasonable price but do not expect it last long or as an everyday use! We also bought a more expensive one before this one and it is still in great working order so if you are looking for something to last long term I would spend a little more to get a good one. If you are trying to save money then this one will work for you short term. I would not buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Richard R.

customer_reviews.title: Can't even make a 3 egg omellete
customer_reviews.text: I mixed 3 eggs with sausage, spinach and peppers. After green light came on, I poured part in 1 side (just slightly below full) and part in other side. I had egg mixture remaining in bowl. When green light went out, I opened and the omelettes were runny on top. I close it again for a minute. Bottom was brown and top was still runny. Had to finish as scrambled eggs in separate pan. This is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Al Malone

customer_reviews.title: Maybe okay for an RV and if you're patient - keep checking the inside of the eggs
customer_reviews.text: Took way too long to cook, over 15 minutes - had to cut open the "egg pods" on both sides of this thing several times to cook the inside of the eggs (they were raw still). My fillers were pre-cooked (light veggie and cheese on one, ham and cheese on the other) and I followed instructions. Would probably be okay for an RV and if you were patient. No way to change the setting on this - it's off or it's on via plug.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Best one on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best one on the market. The other red one on here burns the outside while the inside stays liquid. This one cooks to perfection. Just dont use anything metal to remove the eggs and dont clean with anything abrasive or the non stick will come off and make the eggs stick. I had one of these and used it for 4 years every single day the no stick finally got so bad i had to replace it. With the exact same model.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I've ever bought. Bottom is all burnt and scorched and eggs are all still liquid on top. Tried it on 3 different occasions, needless to say that after the 3rd time once the machine cooled off I threw it away. . . . . . DO NOT waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I have to flip it over after the recommended time to make sure it is evenly cooked
customer_reviews.text: It cooks unevenly. I have to flip it over after the recommended time to make sure it is evenly cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Beagle

customer_reviews.title: Tiny omellete
customer_reviews.text: In spite of the promo info, this unit makes a very small omelette. Two eggs only and very little stuffing. If you are big on real omelettes buy a different brand and read the description carefully.
customer_reviews.author: Iron Padre

customer_reviews.title: Works almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Less one star because the underbelly of the top section barely comes in contact with the food. It cooks perfect on the bottom when making an omelette and that would be nice for the top. So that top selection should be only slightly recessed, about 1/4 of an inch. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: agoshopper

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It does make the perfect looking omelette. I thought the texture has a little rubbery. But it's something else that has been put in the cabinet for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: Each side is small so if you want to add other yummy things to the eggs, this doesn’t work. It is NOT easy to clean. If it didn’t have all the nooks & crannies where stuff gets into it would be better. I’d prefer that that the egg compartments could come out so you can run them under the faucet or put them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Cotter

customer_reviews.title: A great little omelet maker!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I really like this omelet maker, but if I were to buy another, I would purchase one that flips. The bottom of the omelets cook faster than the top. I have taken to flipping this one over anyway. That is why many waffle makers are flippable. My boyfriend loves the omelets I make with this too. It gets a workout every weekend.
customer_reviews.author: queenbee

customer_reviews.title: No on/off switch or temperature control
customer_reviews.text: The on/off control is the wall socket plug. Really ? Also there is no temperature control or temperature gauge, just lights yellow (it's on) and green (I guess it's ready). Plug it in and you get whatever it gives you. And nobody knows what that is. It's also cheaply made, for $20 of course. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: womp

customer_reviews.title: One for my grand daughter & one for my niece & they love it. They love egg sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought 2 of these. One for my grand daughter & one for my niece & they love it. They love egg sandwiches. They are 10 and not allowed to use the stove so these are perfect for them to make their own breakfast. Clean up is very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Best little appliance, easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is the best small appliance. It cooks the eggs perfectly. Before I start I spray each side with cooking spray. Very lightly. Scramble two eggs, a splash of soy milk and a generous pinch of cheese and seasoning. Divide evenly between both sides. In a few minutes it's done. I was going to make a few batches to freeze for quick meals on the go, but it's so fast and easy why bother.
customer_reviews.author: RLBA

customer_reviews.title: Can't depend on the light indicators to know when cooking is complete
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean, cooks evenly. However, won't hold a 3 egg omelette even with using both sides. And, does not give a good indication when cooking is complete. The done light comes on too soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love this omelette maker. Each side holds two large eggs, with room for mushrooms, onion and green peppers. Even my husband loves to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda H.

customer_reviews.title: I'd give it a zero, if possible
customer_reviews.text: I had one before that worked well, but I gave it to my mom. I decided to try this one. It didn't work as well, and the omelets always got stuck. It was really hard to clean. The omelets came up with a very rubbery texture. I ended up donating it to Goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: We don’t like this product. The manual doesn’t tell you the recommended number of eggs to use and it doesn’t tell you how long to cook the eggs for. We are guess and burning the eggs. Don’t buy it!!
customer_reviews.author: k moffett

customer_reviews.title: Great omelettes
customer_reviews.text: I love kitchen gadgets. I have a kitchen full of kitchen gadgets. This is one of my favorites. It's easy to use and clean and our omelettes have turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because it takes a long time to cook but it’s super convenient. My 7 yr old loves an omelet before school and I can pour it and start it while getting him up in the morning. Non stick seems to hold up really well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Elliott Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Good investment! Will make eating healthy super easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Eating healthy made simple. I agree that I was surprised there weren’t more guidelines on how many eggs to use, how long to cook them - but overall - I love it - bonus, it’s Red! Eggs for dinner, breakfast, a snack! No more scrubbing pans, having to stand over a skillet...
customer_reviews.author: Fitness

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Waited for over 40 minutes and the light never changed. Tried it again and gave up after 20 minutes. Returned next day
customer_reviews.author: Beemarie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: To small. Used it once and gave it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ruth fortner

customer_reviews.title: Can't make an omelette? Try this device
customer_reviews.text: THere is no way you can fail with this device. Let your mind go wild. Just add what you want in your omelette, wait a couple minutes et voila. No more burnt pans!
customer_reviews.author: Sing Abend

customer_reviews.title: At least it's easy to clean.. not really functional
customer_reviews.text: It's honestay easier to make an omlet in a pan the old fashioned way... There's really no way to tell when the egg is cooked besides stabbing the egg. The light turns on and off randomly, I think it's to tell you when the cooker is ready for you to put ypur egg in it... it just doesn't work great
customer_reviews.author: a.roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is very shallow. I usually make deep omelettes with lots if cheese. I'm luckily if I can squeeze in one slice.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Ok for price
customer_reviews.text: Obviously low cost material but it does clean up easily. One egg omelette so it’s small. One omelette at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P

customer_reviews.title: Works well and cleans easily!
customer_reviews.text: I use two egg whites and one yolk - add some spinach, onion, red and green pepper, and shredded cheese. Wait 4-5min. and it's perfect. I use a non stick spatula to slide each half out. It's definitely not made for a large omelette but works for me. Cleanup is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Item shipped and paint was already coming off of the inside. It should have been inspected before being sent out
customer_reviews.author: Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It takes a long time for the omelettes to cook. For the convenience of doing 2 at once and not flipping it is good but it doesn't cook fast and takes forever to get done.
customer_reviews.author: Mom 2019

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised...for the price this does exceptionally well. Doesn't make the largest omelettes, but for what it is and the price we paid, zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: hyperion24

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw mine in the trash. Eggs get stuck and its really easy to scratch it.
customer_reviews.author: Bansheebaby

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Gadget !!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my new omelet maker, so easy to whip up a batch or just make me one. I also used it to make some pancakes from biscuit mix. THANKS
customer_reviews.author: Landa

customer_reviews.title: Amazon stands behind the products the carry.
customer_reviews.text: I chose the product because it is a double omelet maker. I chose the brand because of the reviews I read on Amazon. Almost to a person, the product was rated very high. Ease in cooking, easy cleanup, and the omelet itself are a bonus. I have made bacon and cheese omelets, ham, mushroom and cheese omelets....all have turned out to be very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: SULA J. MCCURDY

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but no timer or directions on how to use/cook times
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! The only complaint I have is that there isn’t a timer and instructions that have recipes in it don’t actually tell you how many eggs to use ect. It holds 2 eggs with a tsp of milk and it takes mine about 5minutes to cook through. And that’s without any veggies or meat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Stopped heating and working i. The middle of my first use. My mom ordered another one and it did the same thing. No warranty in the box or anything. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: marquita epps

customer_reviews.title: Omelette Maker East to Use
customer_reviews.text: I do like this omelette maker but wish it was bigger. I will give this to my daughter for college and buy a larger one. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA A. STANCE

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome! Easy to use and clean and doesn't take up much room. Can easily make a healthy omelet within minutes without the mess.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product to uses on the office for fresh omelet. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This omelette maker works very well, making fluffly omelettes very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Drjhp

customer_reviews.title: Estimate tIme for cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Works well but no timer for cooking. Have to guess when omelette is done.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur M.

customer_reviews.title: Service was great!
customer_reviews.text: And so is the omelette maker! I've used it a lot since receiving it, and it's almost too easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: daniel coates

customer_reviews.title: could someone tell me whether this is a big problem or small problem.
customer_reviews.text: There is a problem about red indicator light. The red indicator light is never off, even the green indicator light is illuminating. Could someone tell me whether this is a big problem or small problem. Except this problem, this product is very good because it is easy to use and clean, also is inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. It was a Christmas gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jfreeman

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed. It is not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. It is not what I expected. It takes too long to make anything, and the size of the portions is too small. It is easy to clean, but it is not non-stick. It is not what is advertised. I would not recommend this for a family!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Trapp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and makes omelet's quick and trouble free!
customer_reviews.author: tom mcnab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great because you can make 4 eggs at one time.
customer_reviews.author: mcmamarw

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Burns the hell out of the outer layer. Nastiest omelet I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: EASY
customer_reviews.text: Truly the easiest product you will ever use. Makes perfect omelet every time! Best to pour mixture in while product is cold because the upper plate does get quite hot. Make sure to fill each slot to the top. Great for people who are not great cooks, low vision or blind.
customer_reviews.author: darlene barrett

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical at first but it came through. Hosted a brunch and had an omelet station and everyone loved it. The omelets are perfect. Be careful about the eggs. I pre measured for safety. My only complaint would be how long it takes for the omelet. Approximately 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Gant

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it less than 2 months went to use it last night and now it won't heat up. Waste of money and now I can't return it won't buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Better Chef Omelet Maker review
customer_reviews.text: My first omelet turned out great. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy omelette
customer_reviews.text: Love it perfect omelette. So easy. Had no issues with it. Perfect for a single person.
customer_reviews.author: DJ HILL

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: makes great omelettes. they are just the right size for us.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Barnhardt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his omelet maker! The only downside is you can't really wash it, only wiping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves omelettes and this was easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jtamsmom5

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient for making omelettes. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: D Blanchfield

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, if a little delicate.
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can get a consistent result every time, but I don't like that you can't really go over two eggs without making a sweet holy mess. If there was a market for a bigger version of this, I'd buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying. Eggs are still raw after lights turn off.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband and the only complaint, I wish it made a bigger omelet.
customer_reviews.author: dfleming

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooooo glad that I ordered this, fast and easy to make omeletts
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was to small and only be able to use one egg ;(
customer_reviews.author: Lajuan

customer_reviews.title: take forever to heat never get green lite
customer_reviews.text: never get up to heat takes 30 minutes to cook
customer_reviews.author: LARRY BOARD

customer_reviews.title: its alright
customer_reviews.text: its ok does not cook the whole top of omelet i have to remove it and flip top over in a skillet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Good!
customer_reviews.text: Using now for several months and have had no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E. Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: THE OMELETTE STICKS
customer_reviews.text: I DID NO LIKE IT BECUASE IT IS REALLY HARD TO CLEAN THE OMELETTE STICKS EVEN IF YOU PUT OIL, OR BUTTER. I DONT LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for dormitory's
customer_reviews.text: No little green light came on, no indication omelets were done, no on/off switch. Omelettes were smaller than i expected
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: works great, but looking for recipes I saw on TV ...
customer_reviews.text: works great, but looking for recipes I saw on TV to make other things than omelettes and can't find anything posted
customer_reviews.author: Carol Baker

customer_reviews.title: There was a piece broken off the back of the ...
customer_reviews.text: There was a piece broken off the back of the omelette maker, but didn't affect the way it preforms. A little small as in size of omelette.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia L Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.. Makes a perfect omelet without me making a mess..
customer_reviews.author: Kendall C Johnson-Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to turn on or off and very good cooking it will not burn.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Crame

customer_reviews.title: I love how quickly it cooks but I didn't like how ...
customer_reviews.text: I love how quickly it cooks but I didn't like how it doesn't give you an idea of how many eggs to use so for the firsts ones I had to kind of wing it and see what happened
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Easy Omelette Maker!
customer_reviews.text: Great home product for small omelette's. Easy to make and fast cooking time.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: just a little different from earlier model
customer_reviews.text: doesn't seem to cook as fast or as well as an older model I had. still, it does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy J Phillips

customer_reviews.title: works well.
customer_reviews.text: works well. I wish it would have the light turn off when it is done so I'm not timing it
customer_reviews.author: Cari Hughes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the cooker is poorly designed, eggs don't get cooked on top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't cook the omelet fully. Don't like it at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Leisa Gracia

customer_reviews.title: Great Omelette maker
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift to my sister and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: We love this! The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is I wished it had some sort of a timer on it.

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I make awesome omlettes but I can also bake muffins and small cakes
customer_reviews.author: Edward S.

customer_reviews.title: on/off switch
customer_reviews.text: disappointed it doesn't have an on/off switch. having to plug it in to turn it on is crazy. I want to plug it in and turn it on when I'm ready.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B. Westman

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Ok quality works fast easy to clean but even with oil or butter the omelet stick to the bottom part
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can make an omelette without making a mess in this maler
customer_reviews.text: Such a easy maker to use. It’s so simply and doesn’t take that long to cook

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without it?
customer_reviews.text: Just 8 minutes to the perfect omelette. I love this thing!

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: No handle, easy to burn hands, tiny compartments, impossible to cook a true omelet.

customer_reviews.title: Great Omelette Maker
customer_reviews.text: This omelette maker makes the best tasting and easiest omelettes ever!

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this device for quick morning omelet for me and my co-workers, works great. Since we are on Weight Watchers counting points, eating an omelet is ideal.

customer_reviews.title: Good product Just complicated in cooking it
customer_reviews.text: Good product just don't get why omelette come out a certain way

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cook in minutes. Didn’t cook at all
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Do not buy! After 20 minutes the eggs were still runny and uncooked. Not suitable for dorm life.

customer_reviews.title: good producy

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the write up
customer_reviews.text: Omelette is not like it says as the outside is too brown, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love how convenient it is! Super easy to use! Cooks quickly! Super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

product_meta.title: Better Chef Red Omelette Maker Color, Medium
product_meta.description:
Color:Red

It has never been easier to make delicious, fluffy omelets with your favorite veggies and cheeses in minutes--no flipping, no pans, and no mess! The Better Chef IM-477R Non-Stick Double Omelette Maker allows you to prepare a delicious omelette in no time. Just mix ingredients in a bowl and then pour into the IM-477R’s non-stick cooking surface. Once done, the nonstick surface makes the clean up process a breeze.

The IM-477R also features a cool-touch exterior, so no more worries about burning yourself while cooking like you would on a traditional pan or skillet. With the IM-477R you can prepare 1 or 2 omelettes at a time. Omelettes aren’t just for breakfast anymore; enjoy a tasty and nutritious omelette anytime of the day with the Better Chef IM-477R.

 

BETTER CHEF IM-477R NON-STICK DOUBLE OMELETTE MAKER FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS:

 * NON-STICK COOKING SURFACE FOR QUICK AND EASY CLEAN UP
 * COOKS 2 OMELETTES AT ONCE
 * NO FLIPPING REQUIRED
 * COOL TOUCH EXTERIOR WITH STYLISH RED HOUSING

feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL LOOKING OMELETTES: It has never been easier to make delicious, fluffy omelets with your favorite veggies and cheeses in minutes--no flipping, no pans, and no mess! The Better Chef IM-477R Non-Stick Double Omelette Maker allows you to prepare a delicious omelette in no time. Just mix ingredients in a bowl and then pour into the IM-477R’s non-stick cooking surface. Once done, the nonstick surface makes the clean up process a breeze.

EASY CLEAN UP: The Better Chef IM-477R Non-Stick Double Omelet Maker features a non-stick interior cooking surface which makes up the clean up process a breeze. To clean, just wipe the interior using a damp cloth made from non-abrasive material after each use. To extend the lifespan of the non-stick it is recommended to cover the plates with cooking oil occasionally.

NO MORE HASSLE: Now it's easy to make delicious, fluffy omelets with your favorite veggies and cheeses in minutes--no flipping, no pans, and no mess. Say goodbye to all the hassles associated with making omelettes and hello to the Better Chef IM-477R Non-Stick Double Omelette Maker.

COOL-TOUCH EXTERIOR: The IM-477R also features a cool-touch exterior, so no more worries about burning yourself while cooking like you would on a traditional pan or skillet. With the IM-477R you can prepare 1 or 2 omelettes at a time. Omelettes aren’t just for breakfast anymore; enjoy a tasty and nutritious omelette anytime of the day with the Better Chef IM-477R.

YOUR OMLETTE, YOUR WAY: With the Better Chef IM-477R, you can make your favorite omelette in matter of minutes. You can experiment with new ingredients or stick to your staples. The IM-477R is a great way to expand on your culinary desires. Better Chef, Better Results
